title: Mortal Kombat 1: Reveal Trailer Breakdown
description:
The next Mortal Kombat game has finally been revealed, and you know what that means: another timeline reset. Mortal Kombat 1 takes the series back in time to before even the events of the original Mortal Kombat, as Fire God Liu Kang's new timeline goes all the way back to the days of The Great Kung Lao. Here's our breakdown of the Mortal Kombat 1 trailer.

#IGN #MortalKombat

title: Indiana Jones and the Dial of Destiny - Official Behind the Scenes Clip (2023) Harrison Ford
description:
Harrison Ford returns to the role of the legendary hero archaeologist for this highly anticipated final installment of the iconic franchise, which is Directed by James Mangold ("Ford v Ferrari," Logan"). Starring along with Ford are Phoebe Waller-Bridge (“Fleabag”), Antonio Banderas (“Pain and Glory”), John Rhys-Davies (“Raiders of the Lost Ark”), Toby Jones (“Jurassic World: Fallen Kingdom”), Boyd Holbrook (“Logan”), Ethann Isidore (“Mortel”) and Mads Mikkelsen (“Fantastic Beasts: The Secrets of Dumbledore”).

#IGN #IndianaJones #Movies

title: Killers of the Flower Moon - Official Teaser Trailer (2023) Leonardo DiCaprio, Robert De Niro
description:
Check out the teaser trailer for Killers of the Flower Moon, an upcoming movie starring Leonardo DiCaprio, Robert De Niro, Lily Gladstone, Jesse Plemons, Tantoo Cardinal, Cara Jade Myers, JaNae Collins, and Jillian Dion. 

Based on David Grann’s best-selling book, Killers of the Flower Moon is set in 1920s Oklahoma and depicts the serial murder of members of the oil-wealthy Osage Nation, a string of brutal crimes that came to be known as the Reign of Terror. 

Hailing from Apple Studios, Killers of the Flower Moon was produced alongside Imperative Entertainment, Sikelia Productions and Appian Way. Producers are Martin Scorsese, Dan Friedkin, Bradley Thomas and Daniel Lupi, with DiCaprio, Rick Yorn, Adam Somner, Marianne Bower, Lisa Frechette, John Atwood, Shea Kammer and Niels Juul serving as executive producers. Killers of the Flower Moon is directed by Martin Scorsese and the screenplay is by Eric Roth and Scorsese.

Killers of the Flower Moon opens in theaters on October 6, 2023.

#IGN #Apple #Movies

title: Bleak Sword DX - Official Release Date Announcement Trailer
description:
Bleak Sword DX is a lo-fi dark fantasy action battler game where players fight their way through compact and cursed diorama battlefields against powerful creatures. Players must fight through twelve chapters in order to lift the curse of the legendary Bleak Sword by slaying enemies wielding fierce weaponry and powerful magic. Bleak Sword DX has been updated for Nintendo Switch and PC offering elegant controls, three new game modes, and multiple gameplay and graphical improvements. Bleak Sword DX launches on Nintendo Switch and PC on June 8.

#IGN #Gaming

title: Layers of Fear - Official Apple Silicon Mac Release Date Trailer
description:
Layers of Fear is a first-person psychedelic horror game with a heavy focus on story and exploration being remade in Unreal Engine 5. Layers of Fear will be available on Mac with Apple Silicon taking full advantage of the M-Series chipsets and Metal framework. Layers of Fear is launching on June 15 for Mac, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series S|X, and PC.

#IGN

title: Lost Skies - Official Animated Trailer
description:
Watch this slick, action-packed animated trailer for Lost Skies, an upcoming cooperative survival adventure game for 1–6 players set amongst the clouds, in a vast sky of floating islands. The game comes from developer Bossa Games. In Lost Skies, find and craft ancient technology, build your own skyship, brave ferocious storms, and battle giant threats that await beyond the horizon.

#IGN #Gaming

title: Cataclismo - Official Announcement Trailer
description:
The Cataclismo left us broken. Take a look at the gloomy world of Cataclismo in this reveal trailer for the upcoming game that mixes tower defense and real-time strategy from developers Digital Sun. In Cataclismo, construct fortresses and defend against waves of Horrors. Lead an expedition beyond the gates of the last city, and reclaim mist-shrouded ruins as you rebuild humanity—stone by stone.

#IGN #GameTrailers

title: Bo: Path of the Teal Lotus - Official Announcement Trailer
description:
Explore the gorgeous world of Bo: Path of the Teal Lotus in this announcement trailer for the upcoming 2.5D action-platformer game inspired by Japanese folklore. In Bo: Path of the Teal Lotus, engage in acrobatic aerial combat, unlock powerful mystical abilities, and explore an interconnected world of myth as you seek to unravel the mysteries of your origin. Bo: Path of the Teal Lotus, developed by Squid Shock Studios, will be available on PC in 2024.

#IGN #Gaming

title: Supraland: Six Inches Under - Official Console Launch Trailer
description:
Supraland: Six Inches Under is available now on PC, Xbox One, Xbox Series X/S, PlayStation 5, and PlayStation 4, and coming to Nintendo Switch in summer 2023. From developers Supra Games comes Supraland: Six Inches Under, a standalone first-person adventure set six inches beneath the surface of the original game’s sandbox. In Supraland: Six Inches Under, you must solve crazy puzzles using wacky abilities and escape Cage Town. Check out the console launch trailer!

#IGN #Gaming

title: Stray Gods: The Roleplaying Musical - Official Release Date Trailer
description: Stray Gods: The Roleplaying Musical is a story-rich single-player adventure interactive roleplaying musical where players take on the role of Grace. The game occurs in a world where Greek Gods hide among us. Alter your fate as you make friends, foes, and lovers into song using your abilities with musical persuasion to unravel the mystery of the Last Muse's death. Stray Gods: The Roleplaying Musical launches on August 3 for PC.

title: Breeze in the Clouds - Official Announcement Trailer
description:
Take on the role of an adorable corgi--who can command weather powers--in this 2D action-adventure game Breeze in the Clouds. Watch the trailer to see the pup, Breeze, take on various enemies from this upcoming PC game. From developer Stormy Nights comes Breeze in the Clouds, an upcoming game where you jump, brawl, and command weather powers as Breeze, a scrappy and courageous corgi swept away from his regular life to fight pollution in a fantastic world where animals control the weather.

#IGN #Gaming

title: #Blud - Official Announcement Trailer
description:
Meet Becky, a normal high schooler who also happens to be a vampire slayer, in this announcement trailer for #Blud, an upcoming animated dungeon crawler game from developer Exit 73 Studios. Check out the trailer to learn about Becky and see the character take on evil creatures and the vampire apocalypse in this game, which blurs the line between action RPGs and hyperkinetic 90s cartoons. #Blud is coming to PC in 2024.

#IGN #Gaming

title: Wizard of Legend 2 - Official Announcement Trailer
description:
Here's your look at the action-packed trailer for Wizard of Legend 2, an upcoming rogue-lite sequel from developers Dead Mage. Face perilous magical trials in Wizard of Legend 2, which features up to 4-player co-op and vibrant new 3D visuals. Master new Arcana and elements, experiment with spell combinations, and seek immortality to become a Wizard of Legend.

#IGN #Gaming

title: Apex Legends - Official Threat Level Event Trailer
description:
Watch the latest Apex Legends trailer to see what to expect with the Threat Level event, as one fan-voted Mixtape mode will be available all event long and TDM - Unshielded will join the Mixtape rotation. Additionally, check out Legendary skins for Wraith, Ash, Pathfinder, and more as part of limited-time cosmetic bundles. The Threat Level event for Apex Legends kicks off on May 23.

#IGN #Gaming #ApexLegends

title: The Lord of the Rings: Gollum - Official 'The Making of Gollum: Developer Diary' Video
description:
Join members of the development team for a deep dive into the making of the iconic character Gollum, including his look, his abilities, the writing process, and voicing the character in this behind-the-scenes look at the story-driven action RPG The Lord of the Rings: Gollum.

Experience the untold story in The Lord of the Rings: Gollum, a story-driven action RPG where the twisted protagonist is on a quest to regain the only thing precious to him. Torn by his fractured psyche, you will have to manage both Sméagol and Gollum on a journey that will take him across famous locales, revealing more about his time as a slave below the Dark Tower and his stray with the Elves of Mirkwood, as he interacts with iconic characters from the series.

The Lord of the Rings: Gollum will be available May 25, 2023 on PC, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X/S, and at a later date on Nintendo Switch.

#IGN #LordoftheRings #Gaming

title: PlayStation 5 Access Controller - Official 'Overview and Behind-the-Scenes' Video
description:
Formally known as Project Leonardo, PlayStation has named its accessible controller called the PlayStation 5 Access Controller in celebration of Global Accessibility Awareness Day. Get the rundown on how the Access Controller is a highly-customizable accessibility controller kit designed to help many players with disabilities play games more easily, more comfortably, and for longer periods. The overview also gives a look at the built-in accessibility features that live directly on your PlayStation 5 console. More details including the release date for the PlayStation 5 Access Controller will be unveiled in the coming months.

#IGN #PS5 #Gaming

title: Warhammer 40K: Boltgun – Exclusive Extended Gameplay Trailer
description:
Enjoy over seven minutes of gameplay from Warhammer 40,000: Boltgun, the upcoming '90s-themed retro first-person shooter set in the Warhammer universe that's out on May 23 for PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, and PC.

#IGN #Gaming #Warhammer

title: Mortal Kombat 1 - Official Announcement Trailer
description:
A new era has begun. Check out the brutal announcement trailer for Mortal Kombat 1, the next game in the fighting series. Discover a reborn Mortal Kombat Universe created by Fire God Liu Kang. Mortal Kombat 1 ushers in a new era of the iconic franchise with a new fighting system, game modes, and Fatalities. Mortal Kombat 1 will be available on PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X/S, Nintendo Switch, and PC on September 19, 2023. Pre-orders are available on May 19, and PlayStation and Xbox players will receive Beta access, available in August.

In Mortal Kombat 1, NetherRealm's Story Mode returns featuring unexpected twists on classic rivalries and original backstories for a wide-ranging cast of legendary fighters, including Liu Kang, Scorpion, Sub-Zero, Raiden, Kung Lao, Kitana, Mileena, Shang Tsung, Johnny Cage, and many others. Mortal Kombat 1 will also introduce Kameo Fighters, a unique roster of partner characters that can assist during matches.

#IGN #Gaming #MortalKombat

title: The Outlast Trials Early Access  Review
description:
The Outlast Trials early access reviewed on PC by Travis Northup.
The Outlast Trials is a unique cooperative horror game with a fantastic premise and some really memorable scenarios, but while the early access version proves the concept there’s a lot of work to be done to make those ideas pay off. Running around with friends as you hide from murderous killers and complete utterly insane (and sometimes too edgy for their own good) death games is paradoxically tense and hilarious, but the fact that the enemy AI is about as effective as a concrete parachute and two of the three levels share too much of the same DNA certainly leaves a lot of room to grow on. 

#IGN #Gaming

title: How to Get The Master Sword in Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom
description:
How do you find the Master Sword in Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom? Look no further.

No Legend of Zelda game is complete without the retrieval of Link’s iconic Master Sword and Tears of the Kingdom is no different. There are actually several ways to claim the weapon this time, so here's how you get the Master Sword in Tears of the Kingdom.

#tearsofthekingdom #ign #zelda

title: The Nier: Automata Mod That Fooled the World | IGN Inside Stories
description:
In June 2022, a new user on the Nier Automata subreddit asked a fairly innocuous question: "How do you open the church?" The problem? There was no such church. SadFutago kicked off a beautiful mess of a multi-month storyline that twisted the community, media, and even expert modders into knots.

We tracked down the trio of creators behind SadFutago to get the true tale behind the Nier automata church saga. This is the IGN Inside Story of the Nier Automata modders that fooled the world.

#IGN #Gaming #NierAutomata

title: The Five Nights At Freddy’s Movie ACTUALLY Looks Decent - IGN Now
description: The FNAF movie teaser is here, and we’re asking the question: was it worth the long wait? Scott Cawthon first announced a film adaptation in 2015. Then 2017 rolled around, where Jason Blum announced he’d be adapting it under his Blumhouse Production brand. The Five Nights At Freddy’s movie has had a long gestation period in Hollywood, so FNAF fans are assuredly hype to see Freddy, Chica, Bonnie, and Foxy on the big screen. And Matthew Lillard is presumed to be William Afton, the creator of Fazbear Entertainment. How does it hold up to Willy’s Wonderland, or the Banana Splits Movie? Since the announcement of the Five Nights at Freddy’s movie, Hollywood has tried to capitalize on the success of the FNAF formula through these live-action films, one starring Nic Cage. Willy’s Wonderland might not have been a box-office hit, but it was a hit amongst fans, particularly #FNAF fans. We also talk about The Amazing Spider-Man issue 26 where a pivotal superhero dies, which Marvel is billing as the most shocking issue in 50 years. We also give you the rundown on what to possibly expect from Sony’s PlayStation Showcase!

title: The Little Mermaid - Official 'Poor Unfortunate Souls' Clip (2023) Melissa McCarthy, Halle Bailey
description:
Watch this new clip from The Little Mermaid featuring Ursula (played by Melissa McCarthy) singing about how she uses her magic to help "poor unfortunate souls." Disney's upcoming live-action remake of The Little Mermaid also stars Halle Bailey as Ariel, Jonah Hauer-King as Prince Eric, Javier Bardem as King Triton, Daveed Diggs as Sebastian, Jacob Tremblay as Flounder, Awkwafina as Scuttle, Noma Dumezweni, Jude Akuwudike, and more.

The Little Mermaid, directed by Rob Marshall and written by David Magee, opens in theaters on May 26, 2023.

#IGN #Movies

title: Exclusive look at #esixgaming campus  @SixFlagsFiestaTexas    #gaming #esports #sixflags #shorts
description: In partnership with Six Flags

title: The Creator - Official Teaser Trailer (2023) John David Washington, Gemma Chan, Ken Watanabe
description:
Check out the trailer for The Creator, an upcoming sci-fi action thriller movie directed by Gareth Edwards (“Rogue One,” “Godzilla”), and starring John David Washington (“Tenet”), Gemma Chan (“Eternals”), Ken Watanabe (“Inception”), Sturgill Simpson (“Dog”), Madeleine Yuna Voyles, and Allison Janney (“I, Tonya”).

Amidst a future war between the human race and the forces of artificial intelligence, Joshua (Washington), a hardened ex-special forces agent grieving the disappearance of his wife (Chan), is recruited to hunt down and kill the Creator, the elusive architect of advanced AI who has developed a mysterious weapon with the power to end the war… and mankind itself. Joshua and his team of elite operatives journey across enemy lines, into the dark heart of AI-occupied territory… only to discover the world-ending weapon he’s been instructed to destroy is an AI in the form of a young child. 

The film's screenplay is by Gareth Edwards and Chris Weitz, from a story by Edwards. The producers are Gareth Edwards, p.g.a., Kiri Hart, Jim Spencer, p.g.a., and Arnon Milchan. The executive producers are Yariv Milchan, Michael Schaefer, Natalie Lehmann, Nick Meyer, and Zev Foreman.

The Creator opens in theaters on September 29, 2023.

#IGN #Movies

MCU Actor Set To Co-star In Venom 3 - IGN The Fix: Entertainment
description:
Chiwetel Ejiofor, who played Mordo in the Dr. Strange movies, will apparently be making an appearance in the next MCU-adjacent Venom film. Aptly titled #Venom3. Not much is known about Venom 3 at this point, but with the inclusion of an already established MCU actor, it’ll be interesting to see what direction they’re going.  Hawkeye spinoff Echo has received a release date, and it'll be the first MCU series to drop a full season at once. Echo will drop all of its Season 1 episodes on Disney+ on Nov. 29. And finally today, Disney+ has announced that the first four Indiana Jones movies will start streaming on the platform on May 31.

#IGN #Marvel #MCU

title: The Blackening - Official Final Trailer (2023)  Grace Byers, Dewayne Perkins, Jay Pharoah
description:
Check out the new trailer for The Blackening, an upcoming movie starring Grace Byers, Jermaine Fowler, Melvin Gregg, X Mayo, Dewayne Perkins, Antoinette Robertson, Sinqua Walls, with Jay Pharoah, and Yvonne Orji.

The Blackening centers around a group of Black friends who reunite for a Juneteenth weekend getaway only to find themselves trapped in a remote cabin with a twisted killer. Forced to play by his rules, the friends soon realize this ain’t no motherf****** game. 

Directed by Tim Story (Ride Along, Think Like A Man, Barbershop) and screenplay and screen story by Tracy Oliver (Girls Trip, Harlem) & Dewayne Perkins (The Amber Ruffin Show, Brooklyn Nine-Nine), The Blackening skewers genre tropes and poses the sardonic question: if the entire cast of a horror movie is Black, who dies first?

The Blackening opens in theaters on June 16, 2023.

#IGN #Movies
